body.name: 180 Packs Mini Watercolor Stationery Set, 12 Styles Lined Stationary Paper and Envelopes Set 5.5 x 8.25 inch Includes Writing Paper Matching Envelopes
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 12 mins

features: 【Sufficient Quantity】You will get 60 sheets of envelopes, 60 sheets of writing paper and 60 sheets of stickers, enough for your daily writing needs, and you can also share it with your friends.

【Easy to Write】Our watercolor stationery set is made of thick paper, the thickness of the envelope is 180gsm, the thickness of the writing paper is 100gsm, the surface is smooth and one side is equipped with a horizontal line design, which makes writing more neat.

【Unique Design】This cute lined stationary has 12 different designs, and you can choose from a variety of styles. The writing paper is printed with exquisite watercolor patterns on both sides. You can choose the style you like to write to your friends, lovers or family members.

【Suitable Size】The size of each piece of writing paper is 14x21cm/5.5x8.25in, and the size of each envelope is 14.6x11cm/5.8x4.31in, you can put the writing paper into the envelope in a suitable size, and stationary set size is suitable for parties in various occasions invite.

【Wide Range of Applications】Our stationery paper and envelopes set with decorative colors is ideal for invitations, fancy letters, christmas gifts, graduations, anniversaries, weddings, birthday parties.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality. Vibrant colors. My students loved using this paper to write to their pen pals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just what I was looking for. Send many notes to a loved one. I mix up the brightly colored stationary, to make a bright, cheerful, multi-colored piece of encouragement in the mail.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Lots of envelopes, but very little paper so you end up with an abundant amount of just envelopes. I will not reorder

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Casual, fun stationery
reviews.reviewText: The color assortment is lovely, and suitable all year round. The styling and colors will work for lots of situations and are appropriate for almost any age range. I'm looking forward to using these for fun, supportive notes, birthdays, and appreciation gifts.The weight of the paper and stock is good. It isn't heavy, so it has a less formal feel which matches the colors and styling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stationary is made of very nice, thick, quality paper. Very pretty ombre effect, mostly blues, pinks and greens. Zero smudging like some cheaper paper I have purchased. One side of the sheet is lined, the other is not. You receive four sheets of round, ombre stickers as well. The envelopes are super nice and sturdy. Looks like they would hold up to a lot of post office abuse. My only issue is that you receive way more envelopes than sheets of paper. Other than that, I am quite pleased with this set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good stationary set!
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with this stationary set. It has a variety of colors of papers and matching envelopes. The paper is good quality. I like that it's not themed or anything - you never know what you might need to send a note for and sometimes "thank you" or "sympathy" cards aren't what I need. I'm very happy with this purchase and definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, good quality set
reviews.reviewText: The envelopes are a thicker paper (not quite as thick as cardstock, but close). The colors are a real soft hue and very pretty. The lines are a nice touch although not really necessary. The only problem I had was trying to figure out which paper (color) went with which envelope. Not a critical issue, but just an observation. I would get this set just for the envelopes alone.
